Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory28.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The biting wind showers the Gray Ravens, bringing with it whirling sand and wearing down the soft synth-skin of the Constructs.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's wait here until the sandstorm ends.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, our bodies can filter out sand grains, so don't worry... cough...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Liv, don't push yourself... At least we have some good news. It's not sand but steel plates now beneath our feet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Tch, my jacket's ruined.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Haha, you seem shocked! Is that your mortal weakness? Your jacket?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You should consider running a soma-cleaning scan on your brain.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Of course I did, soma-cleaning scans do the entire body!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Regrettable. Then it's not because of sand in your brain, but a natural issue.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Wait, everyone! An unknown signal suddenly appeared!', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'It took some finesse, but...'}
{2: '???', 3: 'This is your final destination, tools of Babylonia...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Not a Corrupted?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The sandstorm is disrupting our visual signals, I suggest switching to thermographic sensors for now.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Such advanced Constructs, yet still affected by the winds and the sand?'}
{2: '???', 3: 'How laughable.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The signal ahead has disappeared!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I cannot detect it as well. This method feels oddly familiar...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Kamui, Liv, protect the commandant. Lucia, let us scout ahead in the sandstorm.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm counting on you to cover me.", 4: '1'}
